Aligner Maintenance

Invisible braces require visible discipline. Keep your aligners clear and your treatment on track with these simple rules.

22 Hours/Day

Only remove to eat or brush.

Cold Water Only

Hot water will warp the plastic.

Store in Case

Never wrap in a napkin.

Brush teeth first

Don't trap food against your enamel.

How to Clean Your Aligners

ü™•

Morning & Night

Gently brush the inside and outside of the aligners with a soft toothbrush and non-abrasive toothpaste or mild soap.

ü´ß

Weekly Deep Clean

Soak them in specialized aligner cleaning crystals or a denture cleaner once a week for 15 minutes to prevent odor.

üíß

Rinse Every Time

Whenever you take them out, rinse away saliva immediately to prevent plaque from hardening on the plastic.

üí°

Pro Tip: The Next Tray Ritual

Switch to your new set of trays right before bed. This allows the initial pressure to happen while you sleep, making the transition more comfortable.
